metadata.description: The original stories of the TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES come roaring back to shelves—in all-new full color—with the line of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Classics! Volume 1 contains Mirage Studios issue #13, along with a collection of stories from the Shell Shock trade paperback, including "New York Ninja," "Junkman," "O Deed," "A Splinter in the Eye of God?," "Meanwhile... 1,000,000 B.C.," and more!
metadata.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Classics
